value: we're burning slang american / we're on
this language channel telegram this is
Sean Morgan and I'm here answering a
question for my friend Hamed from this
language channel a telegram about
feeling tired about feeling is slang
words American slang words for feeling
tired mentally or physically so the
first one is beat I'm feeling beat for
example i'm just going to stay in and
watch TV tonight i'm absolutely beat
from going out last night you can think
of being hit or beat until you have no
energy left so or you can say I'm out of
it now this mean could mean more than
just tired if maybe you're not focused
for any reason you can say I'm out of it
i don't feel myself i'm out of it for
example i'm totally out of it today I
think it's because I got up way too
early ok the next one is feeling wiped
out ok I can't play basketball today I'm
too wiped out from my workout this
morning ok if you've been exercising a
lot and you don't have any air left you
can say I'm feeling winded especially
when you've been running you can say
give me 10 minutes to rest and then I'll
go running again I'm too winded from
doing sit ups to do anything ok so if
you are just waking up or you're just in
the middle of the night you wake up if
you're not enough thinking clearly then
you can say that you feel groggy I'm so
groggy in the mornings if I don't drink
coffee for example ok so if you've spent
all of your energy then you can say I
feel spent if I stay up too late tonight
I'll be too spent to go to work tomorrow
another phrase we say is burnt out
okay so we think of energy as like
electricity that's why we also say
things like my brain is fried when you
don't when you use too much energy so if
you're feeling burnt out you can say I'm
burnt out from going to the gym every
day for the last 20 days straight okay
another one is bushed bushed so same
same way that you can use all the other
words i'm feeling bushed I'm totally
bushed you know I've been working too
hard I'm totally Bush from working too
hard another one that might sound kind
of weird is feeling pooped so you can
use it the same way all the other ones
are used I feel so pooped I feel so
tired another one is worn out worn out
you can say worn out for any object like
a watch or something that has been used
or worn so much that it's not worth
anything anymore you can say the same
thing with yourself I feel warned out
worn out because I've been working too
much okay going back to my brain is
fried here's an example I've been
studying for the past 10 hours and now
my brain is totally fried ok here's
another weird sounding one zonked not as
common but it's still an idiom or a
slang word that is used I'm eyes unk
tout I would mean something like I fell
asleep I'm totally zonked I'm tired but
usually it's like Zonk is going to sleep
zonked out another one is jet-lagged
this is slightly related if if you've
been flying on a plane and you change
time zones you feel more tired because
you're out of the the rhythm so you can
say for example i got up at 3am but I'm
still jet-lagged from my trip ok if you
have any more questions about American
slang please send us a message on this
language channel on telegram and also
just so you know I teach the American
accents so you can find out more
information
at the free facebook group American
accent for professionals or you can go
to my website American accent dot
Academy thank you talk to you soon
